DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether web-based program effective reduce incidence eat disorder college woman high risk develop eat disorder .
DOC.detailed_description: Female college student use unhealthy weight control method body image concern may risk develop eat disorder . Developing evaluate intervention reduce eat disorder high-risk population great public health importance . Participants randomly assign either join web-based risk-reduction program receive intervention . The 9-week risk-reduction program focus reduce body image weight/shape concern , identify risk eat disorder , increase healthy weight regulation practice . The program include weekly reading , write assignment , participation moderate electronic discussion group . Changes body mass index ( BMI ) occurrence major stressor psychiatric event assessed determine impact incidence eat disorder . One-year incidence eat disorder determine diagnostic interview , follow may continue 2.5 year .
DOC.criteria: College student risk develop eat disorder Suicidal severe psychopathology Alcohol drug abuse Body mass index ( BMI ) < 18 > 32 Current diagnosis anorexia nervosa , binge eat disorder , bulimia nervosa treatment within past 6 month
